reference.title: topicsubject
reference.shortdesc: Identifies the subject matter of content topics.

section.title: Description
section.p: You use the topicsubject element as follows:

ul.li: Identify the primary subject of a content topic where one subject is more central to the topic's subject matter than any other.
Contain a list of secondary subjects that, in combination, identify the subject matter of the topic.

section.p: You nest the topicsubject element within the topicref element for the topic it classifies. You can embed topicsubject elements within a navigation hierarchy. See also http://www.w3.org/TR/swbp-skos-core-guide/#secindexing.
